component.name: rsensor
component.summary: A lightweight system monitoring tool written in Rust

description.p: rsensor is a terminal-based system monitoring tool inspired by psensor. It provides real-time statistics about your system hardware.

ul.li: Real-time CPU monitoring (usage, temperature, per-core stats)
Memory usage statistics with min/max tracking
GPU monitoring for both NVIDIA and AMD GPUs
Terminal-based user interface with clean, responsive layout
